item.title: Help toolbelt
item.dc:creator: @tio_create tio create
item.description:
@tio_create wrote:

[code=java5]int tbvalue1 = 0, tbvalue2 = 0;

public ToolbeltObject[] tbconfig1 = {new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.KNIFE, 1, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.SHEARS, 2, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.AMULET_MOULD, 4, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.CHISEL, 8, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.HOLY_MOULD, 16, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.NECKALCE_MOULD, 32, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.NEEDLE, 64, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.RING_MOULD, 128, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.TIARA_MOULD, 256, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.CRAYFISH_CAGE, 512, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.FISHING_ROD, 1024, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.FLY_FISHING_ROD, 2048, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.HARPOON, 4096, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.LOBSTER_POT, 8192, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.SMALL_FISHING_NET, 16384, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.BRONZE_PICKAXE, 32768, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.HAMMER, 65536, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.BRONZE_HATCHET, 131072, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.TINDERBOX, 262144, false)};

public ToolbeltObject[] tbconfig2 = {new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.SAW, 1, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.AMMO_MOULD, 2, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.BOLT_MOULD, 4, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.BRACELET_MOULD, 8, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.GLASSBLOWING_PIPE, 16, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.SICKLE_MOULD, 32, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.UNHOLY_MOULD, 64, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.SEED_DIBBER, 128, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.GARDENING_TROWEL, 256, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.RAKE, 512, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.SECATEURS, 1024, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.PESTLE_AND_MORTAR, 2048, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.SPADE, 4096, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.BIG_FISHING_NET, 8192, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.MACHETE, 16384, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.BARBARIAN_ROD, 32768, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.WATCH, 65536, false)
, new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.CHART, 131072, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.CHAIN_LINK_MOULD, 262144, false), new ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem.NOOSE_WAND, 524288, false)};

public class ToolbeltObject implements Serializable {
	
	private static final long serialVersionUID = -7237678960934089803L;
	
	public ToolbeltObject(ToolbeltItem item, int value, boolean added) {
		this.item = item;
		this.value = value;
		this.added = added;
	}
	public int value;
	public boolean added;
	public ToolbeltItem item;
}

public enum ToolbeltItem {
	KNIFE(946), SHEARS(1735), AMULET_MOULD(1595), CHISEL(1755), HOLY_MOULD(1599), NECKALCE_MOULD(1597),
	NEEDLE(1733), RING_MOULD(1592), TIARA_MOULD(5523), CRAYFISH_CAGE(13431), FISHING_ROD(307), 
	FLY_FISHING_ROD(309), HARPOON(311), LOBSTER_POT(301), SMALL_FISHING_NET(303),
	BRONZE_PICKAXE(1265), HAMMER(2347), BRONZE_HATCHET(1351), TINDERBOX(590),
	SAW(8794), AMMO_MOULD(4), BOLT_MOULD(9434), BRACELET_MOULD(11065), GLASSBLOWING_PIPE(1785),
	SICKLE_MOULD(2976), UNHOLY_MOULD(1594), SEED_DIBBER(5343), GARDENING_TROWEL(5325),
	RAKE(5341), SECATEURS(5329), PESTLE_AND_MORTAR(233), SPADE(952), BIG_FISHING_NET(305),
	MACHETE(975), BARBARIAN_ROD(11323), WATCH(2575), CHART(2576), CHAIN_LINK_MOULD(13153), NOOSE_WAND(10150);
	
	private ToolbeltItem(int itemId) {
		this.itemId = itemId;
	}
	public int itemId;
}

public void refreshToolbelt() {
	tbvalue1 = 0;
	tbvalue2 = 0;
	for(ToolbeltObject object : tbconfig1) {
		if(object.added) {
			tbvalue1 += object.value;
		}
	}
	for(ToolbeltObject object : tbconfig2) {
		if(object.added) {
			tbvalue2 += object.value;
		}
	}
	getPackets().sendConfig(2438, tbvalue1);
	getPackets().sendConfig(2439, tbvalue2);
}

public void sendToolbeltConfigs() {
	getPackets().sendConfig(2438, tbvalue1);
	getPackets().sendConfig(2439, tbvalue2);
}

public ToolbeltObject getToolbeltObjectForItem(ToolbeltItem item) {
	for(ToolbeltObject object : tbconfig1) {
		if(object.item == item)
			return object;
	}
	for(ToolbeltObject object : tbconfig2) {
		if(object.item == item)
			return object;
	}
	return null;
}[/code]

 [code=java5]for(ToolbeltObject object : player.tbconfig1) {
		if(object.item.itemId == itemId) {
			if(!object.added) {
				object.added = true;
				player.sm("You have add the " + item.getName().toLowerCase()
						+ " to your tool belt.");
				player.refreshToolbelt();
				player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
			} else 
				player.sm("This item has already been added to your tool belt.");
		}
	}
	for(ToolbeltObject object : player.tbconfig2) {
		if(object.item.itemId == itemId) {
			if(!object.added) {
				object.added = true;
				player.sm("You have add the " + item.getName().toLowerCase() 
						+ " to your tool belt.");
				player.refreshToolbelt();
				player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
			} else 
				player.sm("This item has already been added to your tool belt.");
		}[/code]

else if (componentId == 41){ player.sendToolbeltConfigs(); player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(1178); }
